snippet: The Rams have solved their problems with rushing the passer, so Colt McCoy will have to contend with a defense that has 27 sacks in the last seven games.
lead_paragraph: The Rams have solved their problems with rushing the passer, so Colt McCoy will have to contend with a defense that has 27 sacks in the last seven games.

headline.main: St. Louis Rams at Washington Redskins Preview
